name: Banjo Robinson
slogan: Turning Writing Into a Magical Game for Children
description:
Banjo Robinson is a make-believe globetrotting cat that sends letters to children from all around the world. 

Children write back to Banjo and put their letter under the couch for overnight delivery to Banjo. Parents can then opt to personalise Banjo's messages through our website.

team.title: COO
team.name: Bryan O'Keeffe
team.bioHtml: Entrepreneur. Co-founded myDeskDoctor.com. MBA graduate from Imperial College.

jobs.title: Growth Hacker (In-House Only)
jobs.description:
**The company**

We are a London-based startup looking to disrupt the children’s publishing and educational technology markets with an ambition to grow into a global children’s brand.  The current team includes experienced entrepreneurs and scale up specialists and we were also part of the London 2019 Techstars cohort. 

Our purpose as an organisation is to turn learning into a magical game for children around the world and we are looking for individuals who want to help us deliver that.

If you’re keen to join a dynamic, fast growing company with experienced founders and some incredible investors then Banjo Robinson might just be for you.				

**The product**

Banjo Robinson is a magical globetrotting cat who sends real, personalised letters and goodies to children, twice a month, from exciting destinations like the Taj Mahal, the Great Wall of China, and the Northern Lights of Iceland. 

The idea is that it’s a little bit like writing to Father Christmas, except all year round: kids write back to Banjo using the stationery and stickers provided and leave their replies under the sofa for overnight collection by ‘Cat Mail’. Letters are personalised with details about each child’s interests – their favourite food, hobbies etc., and more often than not, Banjo just happens to be best pals with their pet ;)

Customers sign up to our subscription service and their children receive letters through the post twice a month, along with fun colouring in activities, stickers for their wall map. 

**The Role**	

Results driven role with the primary goal of building, managing and scaling multiple digital marketing channels.

Combined with a minimum of 3 years experience in a social-first marketing role, candidates have a deep understanding of at-least three of the following areas, with examples of previous successful work:

* Paid Social 
* SEO 
* SEM 
* Email Marketing 
* FBAds 
* Display 
* Content Marketing 

As we’re sure you can now tell we're looking for a marketer who knows their way around the relevant platforms themselves and can deliver every element of an effective campaign personally before helping us develop and grow the wider marketing organisation from the ground up.

A passion for children, education, startups and technology is an absolute must.

**Job Offer**

Banjo Robinson is a young company with big ambitions. By joining our team at this stage you have the opportunity to shape and grow the company in your image.

If you, like us, are passionate about children, education, entertainment and magic and want then Banjo Robinson is your company.

We offer:

* Competitive salary 
* Stock options - *as an early employee you have the opportunity to be a significant stakeholder in the business*. 
* Flexible holidays 
* Central London office, Old Street location 
* Autonomy to deliver results
* Pension 

If you think this role is for you then please contact apply@banjorobinson.com with a covering letter & CV outlining your previous experience. 

We look forward to connecting with you. Team Banjo.
